Definitions of Measures Associated with References, Cites, and Citations

Total References: Total number of references to other papers that have been resolved to date, for papers in the SSRN eLibrary.

Total Citations: Total number of cites to papers in the SSRN eLibrary whose links have been resolved to date.

Note: The links for the two pages containing a paper's References and Citation links (when available) are on each paper's SSRN abstract page.
